amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that not more than $2,350,000 may be obligated or expended for the Inter-American Tropical Tuna Commission.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. George Miller.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller, George amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 211 - 215 (Roll no. 382).
